description:
For more than 45 years, our attorneys at the Goldberg & Schulkin Law Offices in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, have provided dedicated medical malpractice and personal injury representation. With another office location in Chicago, Illinois, our attorneys advocate on behalf of people throughout the Midwest who have suffered injuries due to the negligence or recklessness of others. We offer free initial consultations and virtual appointment options.

Since our law offices' founding, we have helped obtain hundreds of millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements on behalf of our clients. Our attorneys handle cases involving a range of complex matters such as the following:

  • Birth injuries
  • Misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis
  • Emergency room, surgical and medication errors
  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Construction accidents

We also represent clients with wrongful death claims, helping families hold those responsible for their loved ones' deaths accountable for their negligent actions.

At the Goldberg & Schulkin Law Offices, we recognize the emotional and financial, as well as the physical toll that brain injuries and other accident injuries may take on those who suffer them and their families. While compensation cannot make their injuries or the pain they cause to go away, obtaining damages for their injury-associated losses may help give them peace of mind and the financial support they need and deserve as they recover.
